member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.BubbleCremeTheme
member.summary: Implicitly applies the Bubble Creme theme to all of its descendent FrameworkElements.
member.remarks: The theme is applied using ImplicitStyleManager.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.BubbleCremeTheme.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BubbleCremeTheme class.
